title: How do i view my grade after a match in the new client??
body: Seriously,, i've clicked everywhere already how do i do this?

replies.body: Rummeris advice is spot on.  Mousing over your IP gains should reveal your mastery stats for that match.  Hope that helps!
Uhm, I think you just need to hover your mouse over the icon of the champion you played (top right corner).
